verses.verse: Be merciful <WH2603> to me, <WH430> God, for man <WH582> wants to swallow me up. <WH7602> All day <WH3117> long, <WH3898> he attacks and oppresses me. <WH3905>
My enemies <WH8324> want to swallow <WH7602> me up all day <WH3117> long, <WH4791> for they are many <WH7227> who fight proudly against me. <WH3898>
When <WH3117> I am afraid, <WH3372> I will put my trust in you. <WH982>
In God, <WH430> I praise <WH1984> his word. <WH1697> In God, <WH430> I put my trust. <WH982> I will not be afraid. <WH3372> What can flesh <WH1320> do to me? <WH6213>
All day <WH3117> long they twist <WH6087> my words. <WH1697> All their thoughts <WH4284> are against me for evil. <WH7451>
They conspire <WH1481> and lurk, <WH6845> watching <WH8104> my steps, <WH6119> they are eager <WH6960> to take my life. <WH5315>
Shall they escape <WH6405> by iniquity? <WH205> In anger <WH639> cast down <WH3381> the peoples, <WH5971> God. <WH430>
You number <WH5608> my wanderings. <WH5112> You put <WH7760> my tears <WH1832> into your bottle. <WH4997> Aren't <WH5612> they in your book?
Then my enemies <WH341> shall turn <WH7725> back <WH268> in the day <WH3117> that I call. <WH7121> I know <WH3045> this, <WH430> that God is for me.
In God, <WH430> I will praise <WH1984> his word. <WH1697> In Yahweh, <WH3068> I will praise <WH1984> his word. <WH1697>
I have put my trust <WH982> in God. <WH430> I will not be afraid. <WH3372> What can man <WH120> do to me? <WH6213>
Your vows <WH5088> are on me, <WH430> God. I will give <WH7999> thank offerings to you. <WH8426>

For you have delivered <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from death, <WH4194> and prevented my feet <WH7272> from falling, <WH1762> that I may walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> God <WH430> in the light <WH216> of the living. <WH2416>
